testcase.classname: US1011 Expedia Sign In Menu Avability
testcase.name: Check if it the favorites button in the sign in menu works
testcase.system-out: Given The user opens the Expedia website....................................passed And The user sees Expedia's home page is visible............................passed And The user clicks on the flights..........................................passed And The user clicks on the Sign In button...................................passed And The user clicks on the list of favorites................................passed And The user checks if there is a heart icon................................passed
